channel.title: Deceitful Pk - Ground Breaking - Constant Updates - Endless Fun. JOIN NOW
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/jrhn5hl30bxvyqm/LOGO.png?dl=0[/img]
[SIZE=4][COLOR="#0000FF"][URL=http://"https://www.dropbox.com/s/v6h6d3itvwari8c/Deceitfulpk.jar?dl=0"]Download[/URL][/COLOR][/SIZE]
[ADMIN=Deceitfulpk] [FONT=Arial][SIZE=3]Welcome , to the Deceitfulpk advertisement page here at we Deceitfulpk we strive for perfection & advancement. We are a 317 server loading various other higher map data & items. Everyday the developers at Deceitfulpk try to give you guys new updates , fixes & content. So come on out and try it you may enjoy your stay.[/SIZE][/FONT][/ADMIN]
[IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/qwnk06qeqiexmtl/cooltext1891888086.png?dl=0[/img]
[ADMIN=Features]
[ul][*]377/667 Maps [*]667 Items [*]667 Gfx & Animations [*]Full Summoning [*]Duo Dungeoneering & Slayer [*]Custom Construction [*]Smooth gameplay [*]Dwarf multi cannon [*]Perfect item switches [*]Many bosses to defeat [*]Bounty Hunter [*]Clan Wars [*]Great drop system [*]All skills fully working [*]Server Stability [*]Advanced Fog [*]HDMinimap [*]Tweening [*]Fullscreen & Resizable [*]99% Bank tabs [*]Target System [*]10+ Bosses [*]Bank Pin System [*]Quest System [*]& many many more features..[/ul]
[/ADMIN]
[IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/e28f9ooyr7cxnn3/cooltext1891884967.png?dl=0[/img]
[SPOILER=Some images of the server [IMG]http://i554.photobucket.com/albums/jj409/xxxglitcherxxx/Screenshot_17.png[/img] [IMG]http://i554.photobucket.com/albums/jj409/xxxglitcherxxx/Screenshot_7-5.png[/img] [IMG]http://i554.photobucket.com/albums/jj409/xxxglitcherxxx/Screenshot_18.png[/img] [IMG]http://i554.photobucket.com/albums/jj409/xxxglitcherxxx/Screenshot_16.png[/img] [IMG]http://i554.photobucket.com/albums/jj409/xxxglitcherxxx/Screenshot_12.png[/img] [IMG]http://i554.photobucket.com/albums/jj409/xxxglitcherxxx/Screenshot_11.png[/img] [IMG]http://i554.photobucket.com/albums/jj409/xxxglitcherxxx/Screenshot_10-2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i554.photobucket.com/albums/jj409/xxxglitcherxxx/Screenshot_13-1.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4479339/Screenshot_1.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4479340/Screenshot_2.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/4479342/Screenshot_3.png[/img] [/SPOILER][/CENTER][/CENTER]
Alot of updates & fixes * all updates and fixes stem from january 22 until now.
[SPOILER=Updates & Fixes] [ul][*]Adding some customs like wings, ice torva etc [*]Money Pouch [*]Reduced Client Usage [*]Slayer Master shouldnt give you nulled tasks now [*]Character & Npc lighting fixed less glossy [*]Random events [*]Nex now drops crystal keys for chest at home [*]New better drop table [*]Alot of price adjustments [*]Fixed a combat bug [*]An issue regarding dfs on npc gfx has been fixed [*]Regular users can now fish and cook rocktails [*]Creating extremes works now (simple methods for now) [*]Thieving now gives you coins again [*]Zipped cache with new sprites [*]Over 10 Npc's added to the slayer task lists [*]Fixed the rocks in the crafting guild [*]Skilling experiences has been decreased slightly [*]You cannot change your xp rate anymore [*]You cannot bring pets with you in GWD [*]Increased smithing & summoning XP slightly [*]Donator Points added to the quest tab [*]x10 hits are now togglable :x10on or ::x10off [*]Added vine whips [*]All roofs removed [*]Offer 1,5,10,20,or All [*]Ancient Curses with working protect item, leeches, soul split, and turmoil. [*]Added a fully working miasmic barriage(GFX + Anim) [*]Rewrote some skills [*]Rewrote some dialogues [*]Finished working on new login screen :D [*]The Ritual Quest Added [*]Fixed a summoning dupe glitch in server [*]Added in nex armour effects [*]Added spirit shield effects [*]Hitsplats are now toggable [*]Custom dungeoneering will soon be release when i get lobby maps* [*]You can now easily dice through the clanchat you are in [*]You can now change the fog color ::fog-white [*]Cooking gauntlets has been added to the skilling shop [*]All black triangle issues fixed [*]Client now loads 377/508/667 maps [*]Ags & dragon claws special now works [*]Reverted back to old hit points bars[/ul] [/SPOILER]

item.title: Deceitful Pk - Ground Breaking - Constant Updates - Endless Fun. JOIN NOW
item.dc:creator: @ProjectRezurrection ProjectRezurrection
item.description:
@ProjectRezurrection wrote:

[CENTER]

[SIZE=4][COLOR="#0000FF"][URL=http://“https://www.dropbox.com/s/v6h6d3itvwari8c/Deceitfulpk.jar?dl=0”]Download[/URL][/COLOR][/SIZE]

[ADMIN=Deceitfulpk]
[FONT=Arial][SIZE=3]Welcome , to the Deceitfulpk advertisement page here at we Deceitfulpk we strive for perfection & advancement. We are a 317 server loading various other higher map data & items. Everyday the developers at Deceitfulpk try to give you guys new updates , fixes & content. So come on out and try it you may enjoy your stay.[/SIZE][/FONT][/ADMIN]

[ADMIN=Features]

[ul][]377/667 Maps
[]667 Items
[]667 Gfx & Animations
[]Full Summoning
[]Duo Dungeoneering & Slayer
[]Custom Construction
[]Smooth gameplay
[]Dwarf multi cannon
[]Perfect item switches
[]Many bosses to defeat
[]Bounty Hunter
[]Clan Wars
[]Great drop system
[]All skills fully working
[]Server Stability
[]Advanced Fog
[]HDMinimap
[]Tweening
[]Fullscreen & Resizable
[]99% Bank tabs
[]Target System
[]10+ Bosses
[]Bank Pin System
[]Quest System
[*]& many many more features…[/ul]

[/ADMIN]

[SPOILER=Some images of the server











[/SPOILER][/CENTER][/CENTER]

Alot of updates & fixes * all updates and fixes stem from january 22 until now.

[SPOILER=Updates & Fixes]
[ul][]Adding some customs like wings, ice torva etc
[]Money Pouch
[]Reduced Client Usage
[]Slayer Master shouldnt give you nulled tasks now
[]Character & Npc lighting fixed less glossy
[]Random events
[]Nex now drops crystal keys for chest at home
[]New better drop table
[]Alot of price adjustments
[]Fixed a combat bug
[]An issue regarding dfs on npc gfx has been fixed
[]Regular users can now fish and cook rocktails
[]Creating extremes works now (simple methods for now)
[]Thieving now gives you coins again
[]Zipped cache with new sprites
[]Over 10 Npc’s added to the slayer task lists
[]Fixed the rocks in the crafting guild
[]Skilling experiences has been decreased slightly
[]You cannot change your xp rate anymore
[]You cannot bring pets with you in GWD
[]Increased smithing & summoning XP slightly
[]Donator Points added to the quest tab
[]x10 hits are now togglable :x10on or ::x10off
[]Added vine whips
[]All roofs removed
[]Offer 1,5,10,20,or All
[]Ancient Curses with working protect item, leeches, soul split, and turmoil.
[]Added a fully working miasmic barriage(GFX + Anim)
[]Rewrote some skills
[]Rewrote some dialogues
[]Finished working on new login screen
[]The Ritual Quest Added
[]Fixed a summoning dupe glitch in server
[]Added in nex armour effects
[]Added spirit shield effects
[]Hitsplats are now toggable
[]Custom dungeoneering will soon be release when i get lobby maps
[]You can now easily dice through the clanchat you are in
[]You can now change the fog color ::fog-white
[]Cooking gauntlets has been added to the skilling shop
[]All black triangle issues fixed
[]Client now loads 377/508/667 maps
[]Ags & dragon claws special now works
[*]Reverted back to old hit points bars[/ul]
[/SPOILER]

Read full topic
item.source: Deceitful Pk - Ground Breaking - Constant Updates - Endless Fun. JOIN NOW
